title: Trump Administration Eliminates Key NASA Scientific and Policy Offices
summary: The Trump administration eliminated NASA's Office of Technology, Policy, and Strategy, the Office of the Chief Scientist, and its Diversity office, affecting 23 employees and raising concerns about potential SpaceX influence and reduced climate research capabilities
description: Trump administration ordered NASA to eliminate critical policy, science, and diversity offices, affecting 23 employees and potentially reshaping the agency's strategic capabilities

sources.title: NASA cuts raise fears of handing more influence to SpaceX owner Musk
NASA fires chief scientist, more Trump cuts to come
NASA closes offices, lays off staff as it prepares for larger workforce reductions

notes: Part of systematic reduction of federal scientific infrastructure
